mapper.select: select * from t_transport t where 1=1 order by id desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from t_transport t where 1=1
select * from t_transport t where 1=1 and deleteStatus = 0
mapper.insert: insert into t_transport ( id, addTime, deleteStatus, trans_ems, trans_ems_info, trans_express, trans_express_info, trans_mail, trans_mail_info, trans_name, trans_time, trans_type ) values ( id, now(), #{deleteStatus}, #{trans_ems}, #{trans_ems_info}, #{trans_express}, #{trans_express_info}, #{trans_mail}, #{trans_mail_info}, #{trans_name}, #{trans_time}, #{trans_type} )
mapper.update: update t_transport set id=#{id} ,deleteStatus=#{deleteStatus} ,trans_ems=#{trans_ems} ,trans_ems_info=#{trans_ems_info} ,trans_express=#{trans_express} ,trans_express_info=#{trans_express_info} ,trans_mail=#{trans_mail} ,trans_mail_info=#{trans_mail_info} ,trans_name=#{trans_name} ,trans_time=#{trans_time} ,trans_type=#{trans_type} where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from t_transport t where 1=1 and id=#{id}
select * from t_transport t where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from t_transport where 1=1 and id=#{id}
